raw akas.title: Tiny House Hunters - XXS Traumhaus gesucht

akas: Tiny House Hunters - XXS Traumhaus gesucht Germany
akas from release info: Tiny House Hunters - XXS Traumhaus gesucht Germany

-1.title: Family of Six Downsizes from 2500 Sq. Ft. To Tiny Home
-1.plot: Looking to leave their busy L.A. life behind, Dan, Cindy and their 4 kids are moving to rural upstate New York, and downsizing from 2500 square feet to a tiny home of less than 600 square feet.

1.title: Jersey City Newlyweds Search for Tiny House on Large Rural Lot
1.plot: Home buyers are followed as they search for the tiny house of their dreams in this series, which premieres with newlyweds from Jersey City, N.J., on the hunt for a secluded property in the country.

2.title: Sound Healer Seeks Tiny House in Southern California
2.plot: A sound healer who loves small spaces looks for a tiny home to buy, but she would prefer a circular abode for the acoustics, and she's open to having her bathroom and kitchen outside.

3.title: Oregon Pear Farmers Build Tiny Home with a View in Their Orchard
3.plot: Oregon pear farmers, Ben and Erin, are building a custom home on their orchard. Since they don't want to cut down any of their money-making trees, the house has to fit on a tiny 600 square feet plot.

5.title: Firefighter Goes Super Tiny in Savannah
5.plot: Firefighter and empty nester, Nicki, wants to simplify her life by downsizing from her 2400 square foot house to a much smaller home - really small. She's looking for a place that's no more than 300 square feet.

1.title: A Traveling Nurse Needs a Traveling Tiny Home to Move with Her from Job to Job
1.plot: Tired of constantly packing, a traveling nurse seeks a tiny home that can go wherever she does.

2.title: Going from a Ranch to a Tiny Home in Northern California
2.plot: Oregon pear farmers, Ben and Erin, are building a custom home on their orchard. Since they don't want to cut down any of their money-making trees, the house has to fit on a tiny 600 square feet plot.

3.title: Moving from Parents Place to Tiny House
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Tiny Life in Paradise
4.plot: Ready for a big change, a new retiree is going tiny in her dream destination: Hawaii.

5.title: Tiny Home in Mom's Backyard
5.plot: California newlyweds head to Oregon in search of a tiny home to put in their parents' backyard.

6.title: Fresh Start, Tiny Space
6.plot: Recently single Emilee discovers that going tiny is tougher than she remembers from her childhood.

7.title: A Young, Single Guy in Ohio Seeks the Perfect Tiny House to Fit His No-Frills Lifestyle
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Tiny House, Big Expectations
8.plot: A buyer downsizes from a 3,000 square foot ranch to a tiny house on wheels in Sebastopol, California.

9.title: Family of Five Goes Tiny
9.plot: To simplify their lives and achieve financial freedom, Bethany and Matthew sold their home and moved their family of five in with her parents while seeking a tiny home that can handle a growing family without breaking the bank.

11.title: World Traveler Goes Tiny
11.plot: World traveler Whitney seeks a tiny house in Seattle to keep her life simple.

12.title: Wildlife Photographer Ryan Is Building His Own Tiny House in Fairplay, CO
12.plot: Ryan is a travel photographer from Fairplay, Colorado, who's been living with his parents in between gigs. He's looking to build a tiny house for under $25,000. With his sister as his broker, will Ryan find the right fit?

13.title: After Setbacks, a Florida Family Goes Tiny to Regain Their Financial Freedom
13.plot: A Florida family seeks a hurricane-proof tiny home in the hopes of climbing out of debt.

14.title: Joy and LaToya Are Leaving Hawaii Behind for a Tiny Living in California
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Single Dad Jim Is Downsizing to a Tiny House So That He and Daughter Denver Can Afford to Travel.
15.plot: Single dad Jim wants to travel the world with his daughter Denver, but his teacher's salary in Tulsa, OK, means they'll have to downsize first. He's seeking a rustic-style home with privacy potential for soon-to-be-teenage Denver.

16.title: Heather Plans to Stay Tiny When She Relocates from Her Small Home in Alaska Back to Buffalo, NY.
16.plot: Chattanooga artist Annie is ready to downsize her five-bedroom empty nest to a more manageable 200-square-foot tiny house. With a budget of $35,000, will she find a house that's the perfect fit?

17.title: Teacher Seeks a Tiny Upgrade
17.plot: Massachusetts teacher Joel is ready to leave his rustic cabin in the woods and get back to civilization. He wants a tiny home with indoor plumbing that's close to work, where he can still raise chickens and grow a large garden.

18.title: Tiny Living in Kentucky
18.plot: Youth pastor Jeremy and his wife, Allie, have big plans for their future. They are looking for a small home that comes with acreage, or can be easily moved to a big property with room for Allie to give riding lessons.

19.title: Charleston Couple Goes Tiny
19.plot: Charleston, SC, couple Jim and Miranda agree that they need to simplify their lives. They're searching for a tiny home with enough space for themselves and their two dogs. But their design aesthetics couldn't be more different.

20.title: Starting Fresh by Going Small in San Diego
20.plot: A couple wants to make memories with their young son in a tiny home in Vancouver, Washington.

1.title: Military Family Goes Tiny
1.plot: After traveling to the west coast in a small RV and loving it, Elisa, Brian, and their four kids have decided to downsize permanently for a little more family togetherness. With a budget of $75,000, they're searching for a tiny house in Monterey, CA with private space for each person. Brian wants something that's easily moved, while Elisa wants something that feels more permanent. With a soon-to-be-teenage daughter and three young boys, will they find a home that's the perfect fit?

2.title: Dreams of Downsizing
2.plot: Dreaming of living near a mountain resort, a Colorado couple searches for a tiny home close to skiing and hiking. Will they be able to sacrifice some modern conveniences for the location of their dreams?

3.title: Fresh Start in Asheville
3.plot: Elena sold her restaurant in San Diego, and is ready to start a new business and a new life in Asheville, NC. With a tight budget of $50,000, can she find a tiny home that's the perfect fit?

4.title: A Musician Looks to Simplify His Life by Going Tiny to Spend More Time on His Music.
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Free-spirited Mom Goes Tiny
5.plot: With her kids grown up, a free-wheeling mom feels the itch to simplify her life. She searches for a tiny home that can give her freedom to travel where she pleases but also has enough space to still play with her grandson.

6.title: Free to Be Tiny
6.plot: A kindergarten teacher dreams of a tiny beach house with some amenities of a larger home in Ventura, California.

7.title: Colorado Couple Goes Tiny
7.plot: A couple and their three pets look for the perfect tiny home in Colorado Springs, Colorado.

8.title: Going Tiny to Travel
8.plot: Nebraska couple Mel and Carson are looking for a tiny home to take on the road. Their plan is to live and work in their tiny home as they move from state to state, but agreeing on square footage causes bumps along the way.

9.title: Artist Couple Goes Tiny
9.plot: Looking to simplify, New York glass artists seek a tiny home in Asheville, North Carolina.

10.title: Inspired to Go Tiny
10.plot: Artists in Portland, Oregon, decide to buy a tiny house and get back to nature for inspiration.

11.title: Minimalist Couple Goes Tiny
11.plot: After giving away most of their possessions, a couple wants to go tiny in Kansas City, Missouri.

12.title: Backpackers Go Tiny
12.plot: Atlanta backpackers look for a tiny house on wheels so they can live and work as they move from state to state.

13.title: A Growing Family Looks for a Mobile Tiny House in Fullerton, CA
13.plot: A growing family of 5 looks for a tiny house in Fullerton, CA, that allows them to travel the country and potentially go off-grid.

14.title: Looking to Simplify, Christina and Her Daughter Hannah Are Going Tiny in Woodinville, Washington
14.plot: Animal lovers Christina and her daughter Hannah hunt for a tiny house with room for all their pets in Woodinville, WA.

15.title: New Parents Go Tiny
15.plot: New parents want to raise their growing family debt-free in a tiny home in Elgin, IL.

16.title: Outdoorsy Couple Goes Tiny
16.plot: After living in a tent on the Appalachian Trail, newlyweds build a tiny home in Fraser, CO.

17.title: Building Their Own Tiny Home
17.plot: Recent cancer survivor Kristi and her husband Rafael want to live life to the fullest. They'd like to purchase plans and build a tiny home themselves. But with very different design styles and a $45,000 budget, will they succeed?

20.title: Going Tiny in Austin, TX
20.plot: Hoping for more financial freedom, Colorado native Lisa is moving to Austin, Texas, to start a new life in a tiny house. With a budget of $50,000 and an extensive wish list, will Lisa find a tiny house that she can call home?

21.title: Student Looks to Graduate to Tiny Home
21.plot: Engaged Florida students move from their parents' house into a tiny home of their own.

23.title: Going Tiny in Sunny Florida
23.plot: A couple downsizes to a tiny home for a more minimal lifestyle in Delray Beach, Florida.

24.title: Going Tiny at Sea
24.plot: A South Carolina Couple is ready to live tiny aboard a sailboat, living and working on the boat while splitting time between Charleston, S.C., and the Caribbean. Can they compromise on a sailboat that meets both their needs?

25.title: Tiny California Dreaming
25.plot: California grad student Hali is feeling the pressure of living in the most expensive real estate market in the U.S. With plans to cut costs and find a permanent place to call home, she meets with a tiny home builder in Montana.

26.title: Tiny with Teens
26.plot: Single mom Anna and her two kids are going tiny for more financial freedom in Anderson, SC.

27.title: Texans Go Tiny
27.plot: Wanting to spend more time with their three kids, Texas parents and self-proclaimed nerds are going tiny.

28.title: Bachelor Goes Tiny in San Francisco, CA
28.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

29.title: Living Tiny in Texas
29.plot: Empty nesters who are overseas for months at a time need less house to maintain. She wants a traditional design with generous living space, but he wants a small cabin feel. With a budget of $50,000, will they find middle ground?

1.title: Texas Tiny House Shopping
1.plot: A Dallas cyclist is on the hunt for a tiny home with room for his bikes.

2.title: New York Bed and Breakfast Owners Go Tiny
2.plot: New York Bed and Breakfast owners are betting the farm on going tiny. With their business booming, they're looking to move into a tiny home on their property while their main farmhouse is being used by guests. However, not only will they need space for themselves, they'll also need space for their 15-year-old son. Will they find the perfect tiny home, or is going tiny too big of a challenge?

3.title: Bohemian Family Goes Tiny
3.plot: Heather and Beau want to raise their son in Topanga Canyon, a secluded enclave in the Santa Monica mountains of Los Angeles. While Heather wants Bohemian-chic style, Beau's looking for something more like a rustic cabin.

5.title: Military Couple Goes Tiny
5.plot: With a big wedding to pay for and a military schedule that could move them from city to city regularly, expecting parents are biting the bullet and going tiny. While they both agree downsizing is the best way to go for their growing family, they don't agree on style. She wants a vintage Victorian-style tiny home that feels like a home, but he's leaning toward buying an RV. Will they be able to find any middle ground?

9.title: Traveling Couple Builds Tiny
9.plot: Civil engineer Charlie and his traveling nurse girlfriend Shenee are always on the road for work and are tired of living out of motels. They want to bring their home wherever work takes them, so they're building their own portable tiny house. They both want a spacious loft with plenty of storage, but Shenee's shoe collection and desire for a full-size kitchen might be too much for a tiny house to handle. With Charlie looking for a camp feel and Shenee wanting a more modern design, will they be able to agree on how to build the perfect tiny house?

11.title: Family Goes Tiny in Michigan
11.plot: Bill and his wife, Jamie, are moving their family back to their home state of Michigan. Jamie wants a more manageable home to maintain while Bill, a radio DJ, commutes between two states for work, so they're going tiny. He wants a patio to relax in, and, as a personal chef, she wants a kitchen that will allow her to do her job. Both of them, however, want a move-in ready home right on the lake. Can they find the right tiny home that's suitable for two adults and two adolescent boys?

12.title: Living Cozy in Colorado
12.plot: Fort Collins, Colo. couple Natalie and Chris have decided to sell their three-bedroom hooks and move into a tiny house so they can enjoy more what life has to offer, like exploring the outdoors and brewing their own beer.

14.title: Medieval Enthusiasts Go Tiny
14.plot: New parents and San Diego residents Val and Deanna are ready to buy a new home, but student loans and high home costs have kept them from taking the leap. Therefore, they've decided to go tiny. But while they both want something towable, Val pictures an interior inspired by their passion for medieval history with space for a media center, but Deanna wants something that's a mix between industrial-rustic and mid-century modern with a spacious kitchen. With their $60,000 budget, finding their perfect place in a hot market could prove difficult.

17.title: Going Tiny in West Virginia
17.plot: College student and West Virginia resident Skye wants to be able to pick up and move wherever her career takes her after graduation, so she's going tiny. She wants to custom build her tiny home from the ground up, so she recruits her father Jimmie to accompany her to Austin, Texas, to find the perfect blueprints. Skye wants full-sized appliances and all the amenities of a normal-sized house, and she won't compromise. Will Jimmie be able to keep her expectations grounded?

20.title: Family Shops Tiny and Mobile in Phoenix, Arizona
20.plot: A Phoenix couple downsizes from their 1,800 square foot home to a tiny house nearly a sixth of that size. With their two young children in tow, this couple wants to live a less-stressful and less-cluttered lifestyle while having the ability to travel around the country. He's hoping to find a rustic, modern home with a separate office space, stairs to the lofts and storage underneath. She, however, is looking for something more farmhouse chic with ladders instead of stairs so the kids can use the extra space to play. Their builder shows them some options but can he ...

23.title: Wanting Tiny in Washington
23.plot: A Spokane, WA, native is ready to hit the reset button and make the switch to tiny. With separate budgets for the home and land, he has his eye on a 300 square foot house with a rustic exterior and a modern interior. He wants smaller kitchen appliances, a first-floor bedroom and enough space to comfortably fit his two fully-grown dogs. His ex-wife is helping with the search and thinks he needs to focus on getting a home he can grow into. Can the two come together and find him the perfect tiny home?

imdb.plot outline: Follow home seekers across the country as they look to downsize, way down. They'll check out three unique streamlined houses under 600 square feet before deciding on the perfect compact kingdom to call home. When it comes to choosing one and making an offer, will they join the tiny house movement or stick with wide-open spaces? Viewers will be on the edge of their seats waiting to see what these Tiny House Hunters ultimately decide.
imdb.title: Tiny House Hunters
plot: Follow home seekers across the country as they look to downsize, way down. They'll check out three unique streamlined houses under 600 square feet before deciding on the perfect compact kingdom to call home. When it comes to choosing one and making an offer, will they join the tiny house movement or stick with wide-open spaces? Viewers will be on the edge of their seats waiting to see what these _Tiny House Hunters_ (qv) ultimately decide.
